summary: The diff implements visible, responsive “Call Now” and “WhatsApp” buttons in the Contact section, ensures the exact required link destinations/attributes, adds scroll offset to avoid sticky-header overlap, and provides a documented production-build regression check procedure.

hallucinated_features.description: Added test-specific attributes (data-testid) and additional accessibility labels (aria-label) on the direct-contact button links.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-22/23/24 do not explicitly request test IDs or aria-labels; they are extra implementation details beyond the stated requirements (though compatible with them).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/required icons (Phone, MessageCircle) as part of the button content.
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirements focus on visibility, layout, and correct link behavior; icons are not requested explicitly.
